channel.title: I freakin love this game so much, I wish I could give back to the devs somehow, besides giving them all my money lol
channel.description:
:japanese_ogre:
Besides this game, what's your favorite game?
Poll time _can vote for more than one_ [poll type=multiple results=on_vote min=1 max=19 public=true] * GTA (Grand Theft Auto) * Skyrim * Fallout series * Destiny * Town of Salem * Darkest Dungeon * Fortnight (lul) * PUBG * Dead By Daylight * Chess * League of Legends * WoW * FIFA * Overwatch * DOTA * Dark Souls * Pokemon * Call of Duty * Zelda [/poll] If you don't see you're game here, just post below. Anyways, back to the grind. Love y'all!
